Package org.apparatus_templi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventGenerator
    An interface for all Drivers that can generate events.
    EventWatcher
    An interface for Drivers that wish to be notified of Events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coordinator
    Coordinates message passing and driver loading.
    DummySerialConnection
    A dummy serial connection that does not rely on any hardware.
    Event
    Events represent an abstract way for Drivers to communicate with each other.
    Log
    Logging facilities for Coordinator and the drivers
    Message
    A complete application layer protocol message.
    MessageCenter
    Singleton pattern that handles message fragmentation and de-fragmentation.
    Prefs
    A singleton pattern that maintains a map of default preferences.
    Prefs.Keys
    A convenience class containing known keys that correspond to preference values.
    SerialConnection
    An abstract class that defines all methods that a serial connection must implement.
    SimpleHttpServer
    A simple web server that acts as both a middle man between the Coordinator and any front ends, as well as a host for the bundled web front end.
    UsbSerialConnection
    A serial connection to manage connection and data transfer to and from controller Arduino through a USB connection.
